com.sheepguru.api

Class APIResponse

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.sheepguru.api.APIResponse
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IAPIResponse
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    APIFailure, JetAPIResponse

    public class APIResponse
extends Object
implements IAPIResponse
    The response object used to store data related to a HTTP request response.

        status - status line
        headers - response headers
